title: Serious Face with Symbols Covering Mouth
description:
An angry-red face with a black bar and white grawlixes covering its mouth, indicating it's swearing or being vulgar. Grawlixes are typographical symbols (e.g., @#$%&!) representing swear words or obscenities. Often used to convey an outburst of anger, frustration, or rage.

Most platforms feature the same eyes as on their ðŸ˜  Angry Face and ðŸ˜¡ Enraged Face.
apple_vendor_description: This expressive emoji on Apple devices features a bright yellow face with large, white, circular symbols covering its mouth, conveying a sense of shock, speechlessness, or an inability to express oneself. The smooth, rounded edges and subtle 3D shading characteristic of Appleâ€™s design language give it a distinctly cartoonish yet relatable feel. It's often used digitally to communicate being overwhelmed, having something shocking happen, or being unable to find the right words to respond.
